scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run:prepare-script && pnpm type-check && vitest run tests
scripts.lint: pnpm run eslint:check && pnpm run prettier:check
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run eslint:fix && pnpm run prettier:fix
scripts.prepare:e2e: docker-compose --project-directory ../../sdk/typescript down && docker-compose --project-directory ../../sdk/typescript up -d && cargo build --bin sui-test-validator --bin sui --profile dev && cross-env RUST_LOG=info,sui=error,anemo_tower=warn,consensus=off cargo run --bin sui-test-validator -- --with-indexer --pg-port 5435 --pg-db-name sui_indexer_v2 --graphql-host 127.0.0.1 --graphql-port 9125
